history.proof: intros. unfold list_injective. split. - intro H3. hauto lq: on use: app_nil_l, in_split unfold: list_injective. - intros l1 a m b r H'. hauto lq: on use: app_comm_cons unfold: list_injective.

exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type x : X ll : list X H : list_injective (x :: ll) The term "x" has type "X" while it is expected to have type "~ In ?x ?ll".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: intros l1 a m b r H.

ctx: intros l1 a m b r H'.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type x : X ll : list X H : list_injective (x :: ll) l1 : list X a : X m : list X b : X r : list X H' : ll = l1 ++ a :: m ++ b :: r Unable to unify "list_injective (x :: ll)" with "a <> b".

original: intros. unfold list_injective. intros H. split. - intros H1 H2. apply (in_list_injective_1 x ll). + intro H3. apply H1. apply in_or_app. left. apply H3. + apply H. - intros l1 a m b r H. apply H.
